pkgmetadata.longdescription: Moments of Ratios of Quadratic Forms Using Recursion // Evaluates moments of ratios (and products) of quadratic forms in normal variables, specifically using recursive algorithms developed by Bao and Kan (2013) doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2013.03.002 and Hillier et al. (2014) doi:10.1017/S0266466613000364. Originally developed as a supplement to Watanabe (2022) doi:10.1101/2022.11.02.514929 for evaluating average evolvability measures in evolutionary quantitative genetics, but can be used for a broader class of moments. Generating functions for these moments are also closely related to the top-order zonal and invariant polynomials of matrix arguments.
